title: End-to-End ML using Python
features: Architected a Python‑based end‑to‑end machine learning pipeline that automates data ingestion, preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment, cutting model iteration cycles by 60%.
Implemented feature engineering and model selection using pandas, scikit‑learn, and TensorFlow, achieving a 15% lift in predictive accuracy over baseline.
Integrated CI/CD with GitHub Actions and Docker to streamline model versioning, testing, and production rollout, ensuring zero‑downtime deployments.
